description: Microsoft Excel no longer supports the XLSHTML format. Instead of saving spreadsheets as XLSHTML files, you can now save them as .MHTML and .MHT files, which are more widely supported.

To create a webpage version of your document in Excel 365, select File â†’ Save As , then choose the "Single File Web Page (*.mht, *.mhtml)" option from the dropdown menu. You can also choose to save your document as an .HTM or .HTML file.
